guide-1.title: Scrum Guide | 01
guide-1.sentence: Scrum is a <lightweight> framework that helps people, teams and organizations generate <value> through <adaptive> solutions for <complex> problems.

guide-2.title: Scrum Guide | 02
guide-2.sentence: The Scrum framework is purposefully <incomplete> . Rather than provide people with detailed <instructions>, the rules of Scrum <guide> their relationships and interactions.
